main.name: Nadhifah Nur Shadrina
main.bio: A graduate of Diploma III in Computer Engineering who is enthusiastic with a strong desire to learn and ready to face new challenges in the industrial world. Has experience in project work using React Native and Figma. Detail-oriented and committed to contributing both in a team and as an individual.

education.description: Contributed to projects that honed my communication skills, collaborated with teams, and programming skills. Additionally, I became accustomed to creating technical documents such as Software Requirements Specifications (SRS) and functional testing.

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: A mobile application named Dicuci Applicarion that offers laundry services to customer using React Native. Contribute as Front-End Developer responsible for slicing UI and API integration
